overview: With unprecedented access, we go inside Task Force Argos, the worldâ€™s best investigative team dedicated to rescuing the children being sexually abused by highly organised dark web networks. As technology reaches into every corner of the globe, this has become the fastest growing serious crime in the world. Tens of thousands of children are being exploited and tortured. Argos is often the only hope these children have of being found..

production_companies.name: Children in the Pictures Pty Ltd

tagline: A crime that thrives in silence.
title: The Children In The Pictures
